Oct. 13, 2013 D Oxfordshire & District Brass Band Association Entertainment Contest (Open Section)
Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest (Upper Sections) 10 Entertainments Contest Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest oxfordshire-district-brass-band-associat-3785
None
Marlborough School, Woodstock, Oxfordshire, England, UK Only one entry, Kidlington, who gave a short pre-results concert instead, consisting of: 'Fanfare' from 'King Lear' - Claude Debussy, arr. Duncan Wilson 'Over the Rainbow' - arr. Goff Richards, horn soloist Marilyn Elliott 'Allerseelen' - Richard Strauss, arr. Stephen Roberts 'Labour and Love' - Percy Fletcher
Sept. 10, 2013, 9:45 p.m. Oct. 15, 2018, 8:45 a.m.
Cancelled Kidlington Concert Brass Duncan Wilson
